name: Uncalm Waters
description:
Your boat is under attack! Defend yourself! You can jump (yes..), dive underwater and shoot the heck out of your enemies! Don't dive too deep, or the pressure will crush your hull and you'll sink ;)

Keyboard/Mouse:

W/D to move

Space to jump

LMB to dive

Xbox Controller:

left stick to move

Y to jump

A to dive

Plenty of things I wanted to add, but time was quite short this week. I did what I could. Enjoy!
